title: Remembering Trailblazing New Zealand Rider Nathan Dahlberg Who Died while Mountaineering in China
content:
Kiwi hardman Dahlberg was a member of the iconic 7-Eleven and Motorola teams, often working for famous teammates including Andy Hampsten and Davis Phinney.

Read the full article at Remembering Trailblazing New Zealand Rider Nathan Dahlberg Who Died while Mountaineering in China on Velo.
author: sstokes
